description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. You must submit your bid and all required supporting documentation by 17:00 ET on October 31, 2022. All bids submitted after 17:00 ET will be declared non-responsive.   \\.1 Work under this Contract is at Matsqui Institution, 33344 King Road, Abbotsford, BC. \.2 This is a medium-security institution.   \.3 Work includes but is not limited to: Replacement of the existing Catenary lights with new LED luminaires within the perimeter of the facility. Works and detailed requirements are shown on the contract documents.\\.\nTwo Phase Selection Process: This is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process. The first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested respondents. The second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified respondents to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Upon award of a contract in Phase Two, the qualification list resulting from the first phase will expire and will not be used in any other solicitation. Following Phase Two solicitation closing, bid results will be recorded and may be obtained by emailing/telephoning a request to the address/number indicated in the Invitation to Tender.

full_summary:
[Professional Government Tender Announcement]
=============================================

* **Tender Announcement:** Matsqui Facility Catenary Lighting Upgrade
* **Reference Number/Numéro de référence:** WS3707587214-Doc3707794627

**Tender Details/Détails de l'entente**

* **Publication Date/Diplôme Date:** October 14, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date/Fermé candidature Date:** October 31, 2022, by 2:00 PM ET (Eastern Time)
* **Contracting Entity (Canada)/Entité d'approvisionnement (Canada):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Tender Brief/Qui sommes-nous ?**

* **Tender Number/Numéro de l'enchère:** WS3707587214

**Contract Description/Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) in collaboration with Correctional Service Canada invites companies to bid on this two-phase tender, which consists of a qualification phase and a bid phase.

**Scope of Work/Objectif de la réalisation**

This work includes the replacement of existing catenary lights at Matsqui Institution with new LED lighting at Matsqui Institution, located in Abbotsford, British Columbia. The detailed specifications and requirements are outlined in the contract documents.

**Evaluation Criteria/Critères d'évaluation**

* **Phase 1 (Qualification)**: Evaluation of qualifications of all respondents to assess capacity to perform the work.
* **Phase 2 (Tender)**: Evaluation of the financial bid submitted by the qualified respondents.

**Submission Method/Mode de soumission**

All bids and all supporting documentation must be submitted by October 31, 2022, at 2:00 PM ET.

**Selection Criteria/Critères de sélection**

The contractor will be selected based on the lowest bid price.

**Notice Details/Désignation de l'avis**

URL: [insert URL]

Please contact: Tian Lam (lam.tian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for information concerning this tender.

---

### Responsabilité pour les erreurs d'interprétation

L'entente sera accordée au soumissionnaire qui proposera les tarifs les plus bas.

### Important dates and deadlines
Les soumissions doivent arriver avant 14 h (hév) le 31 octobre 2022.

### Parti aux traités commerciaux

 Ceci est un appel d'offres concurrentiel lou
